mapper.select: select ir.incoming_record_id, ir.batch_id, ir.incoming_amount, ir.goods_id, ir.transport_record_id, ir.record_time, ir.gmt_create, ir.gmt_modified, bi.batch_name, gi.goods_name from incoming_record ir join batch_info bi on ir.batch_id = bi.batch_id join goods_info gi on ir.goods_id = gi.goods_id;
